comments.en:
Works with drivers for Lexmark 5700, but the borders are completely off. It starts printing PostScript pages above the upper border of the paper (reported by D. A. M. Revok, cg178 at Freenet dot Carleton dot Ca). So it is not very much usable under free operating systems. Do not buy it.

Consumables/Refills: Color : $40, Photo : $44, Black : $40
